text: Dmitri Victorovich Anosov (; November 30, 1936 â€“ August 5, 2014) was a Soviet and Russian mathematician. He was known for his work in dynamical systems theory. He was a full member of the Russian Academy of Sciences and a winner of the USSR State Prize (1976). He was a student of Lev Pontryagin. Anosov died in Moscow, Russia, aged 77. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Scientists from Moscow Category:Russian mathematicians
title: Dmitri Anosov
